entry.data:

SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH THIS AFTERNOON

LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
